title: Experiential Mobile Microlearning Course in Financial and Managerial Accounting

context.prior_knowledge: Basic accounting terminology and understanding of financial statement structures
context.additional_context: Conducted in a mobile environment utilizing personal devices (BYOD), structured as 20-minute modular learning sessions three times weekly. Includes game-based activities enabling peer collaboration and real-time feedback

learning_goals: Apply cost calculation processes with 80% accuracy through experiential learning simulations.
Perform financial ratio calculations and visualizations using Excel data analysis tools.
Achieve a 70%+ success rate in budget allocation and decision-making simulations through game-based learning.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
